definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Crystal base, foil glittering and translucent get rid of whole product extremely smart showily.
sentences.chinese: 水晶底座晶莹剔透，烘托整个产品极其醒目华贵。

sentences.english: Love is a kind of very elegant thing to can improve the value of life.
sentences.chinese: 恋爱原是一种可以提高生命价值的很华贵的东西。

sentences.english: Do you want precious things and jewelry?
sentences.chinese: 你要珠宝和华贵的服装吗？

sentences.english: Accommodation varies from simple guesthouses to luxury accommodation. Patong has got everything a tourist needs.
sentences.chinese: 住宿从简单的客栈到华贵的住所都有。

sentences.english: Has someone gave her more showily jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 已有人送给她更加华贵的珠宝。

sentences.english: I asked Rube how she managed to afford to dine out at this swanky place.
sentences.chinese: 我问鲁布她怎么能来这么华贵的地方吃饭。

sentences.english: The sofa was covered with expensive brocade.
sentences.chinese: 沙发上铺上了华贵的织锦。

sentences.english: Concise lines toes form the space of refine is experienced is showily and not make public.
sentences.chinese: 简洁线条凝炼的空间感受是华贵而不张扬。

sentences.english: Yun brocade, rich and grand, is jacquard weave and usually interwoven with gold or silver threads.
sentences.chinese: 云锦华贵瑰丽，常用金线或银线在提花机上织出。

sentences.english: Of dignified showily bring a person spatiotemporal stagger with romantic vogue bewildered be puzzled.
sentences.chinese: 凝重的华贵与浪漫的时尚带给人时空交错的眩惑。

sentences.english: Merry and clear shape likes a radiant and graceful waltz in royal palace.
sentences.chinese: 有着欢快明朗的造型，似雍容华贵的宫殿圆舞曲。

sentences.english: The regal lady had made a deep impression on him.
sentences.chinese: 那位雍容华贵的妇人给他留下了深刻的印象。

sentences.english: Aiming to manifest, show showily gas in silence.
sentences.chinese: 彰显有度，于无声之中展现华贵之气。

sentences.english: Various ornaments can be painted and added to the saddle cover, and the bicycle can be all the more shapely and distinguished.
sentences.chinese: 车座罩上还可涂加各种装饰，使自行车更加美丽华贵。

sentences.english: The emperor was clad in a rich robe encrusted with jewels.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝身穿一件镶满宝石的华贵礼袍。

sentences.english: A cropped leather jacket gives a jeans-and-a-T-shirt look a luxurious spin.
sentences.chinese: 剪裁不齐的皮衣使得牛仔搭配衬衫的造型华贵。

definition: simple and neat/quiet (colors)/unobtrusive/(of food) light/not greasy or strongly flavored
gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
